D

dist(Area) - Method in class gametools.Position
Calculates the distance to the center of object using pythagorean theorem.
dist(Position) - Method in class gametools.Position
Calculates the distance between two positions using pythagorean theorem.
dm(int, int) - Static method in class gametools.Tools
The short form notation for creating a dimension.
draw(Position) - Method in class gametools.Area
Sets the position of the object, and then runs the draw method.
draw() - Method in class gametools.Area
Fills a rectangle on the current area using whatever color is currently set.
